SEARCH
Package model

Class Drink

java.lang.Object
model.Drink
public class Drink extends Object
Drink class, holds all the information about a drink Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data drink_id: Int unique identifier for the drink drink_name: String name of the drink drink_category_id: Int identifier for the category, corresponds to a DrinkCategory drink_price: Double price of the drink active_months: String months the drink is active

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Drink(int drink_id, String drink_name, int drink_category_id, double drink_price)
    Nonseasonal drink constructor; sets active_months to default of year-round
    Drink(int drink_id, String drink_name, int drink_category_id, double drink_price, String active_months)
    Seasonal drink constructor, allows for custom months

  • Constructor Details

    • Drink

      public Drink(int drink_id, String drink_name, int drink_category_id, double drink_price)
      Nonseasonal drink constructor; sets active_months to default of year-round
      Parameters:
      drink_id - int unique identifier for the drink; generated with GenerateID class
      drink_name - String name of the drink
      drink_category_id - int DrinkCategory identifier
      drink_price - double price of the drink

    • Drink

      public Drink(int drink_id, String drink_name, int drink_category_id, double drink_price, String active_months)
      Seasonal drink constructor, allows for custom months
      Parameters:
      drink_id - int unique identifier for the drink; generated with GenerateID class
      drink_name - String name of the drink
      drink_category_id - int DrinkCategory identifier
      drink_price - double price of the drink
      active_months - String months the drink is active
